com.android.car.internal.util

类 ConcurrentUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.car.internal.util.ConcurrentUtils

  • public final class ConcurrentUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for common functionality using java.util.concurrent package

    • 字段详细资料

      • DIRECT_EXECUTOR

        public static final java.util.concurrent.Executor DIRECT_EXECUTOR

    • 方法详细资料

      • newFixedThreadPool

        public static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService newFixedThreadPool(int nThreads,
                                                                      java.lang.String poolName,
                                                                      int linuxThreadPriority)
        Creates a thread pool using Executors.newFixedThreadPool(int, ThreadFactory)
        参数:
        nThreads - the number of threads in the pool
        poolName - base name of the threads in the pool
        linuxThreadPriority - a Linux priority level. see Process#setThreadPriority(int)
        返回:
        the newly created thread pool

      • waitForFutureNoInterrupt

        public static <T> T waitForFutureNoInterrupt(java.util.concurrent.Future<T> future,
                                             java.lang.String description)
        Waits if necessary for the computation to complete, and then retrieves its result.

        If InterruptedException occurs, this method will interrupt the current thread and throw IllegalStateException

        参数:
        future - future to wait for result
        description - short description of the operation
        返回:
        the computed result
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if interrupted during wait
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while waiting for Future.get()
        另请参阅:
        Future.get()

      • waitForCountDownNoInterrupt

        public static void waitForCountDownNoInterrupt(java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch countDownLatch,
                                               long timeoutMs,
                                               java.lang.String description)
        Waits for CountDownLatch.countDown() to be called on the countDownLatch.

        If CountDownLatch.countDown() doesn't occur within timeoutMs, this method will throw IllegalStateException

        If InterruptedException occurs, this method will interrupt the current thread and throw IllegalStateException

        参数:
        countDownLatch - the CountDownLatch which CountDownLatch.countDown() is being waited on.
        timeoutMs - the maximum time waited for CountDownLatch.countDown()
        description - a short description of the operation

      • wtfIfLockHeld

        public static void wtfIfLockHeld(java.lang.String tag,
                                 java.lang.Object lock)
        Calls Slog#wtf if a given lock is held.

      • wtfIfLockNotHeld

        public static void wtfIfLockNotHeld(java.lang.String tag,
                                    java.lang.Object lock)
        Calls Slog#wtf if a given lock is not held.
